reference.title: Deleting Server Groups
reference.shortdesc: Server groups are deleted with the DELETE /pools/default/serverGroups/<:uuid> HTTP method and URI.

section.title: HTTP method and URI
section.p: DELETE /pools/default/serverGroups/<:uuid> deletes a specific server group. The server group must be empty for a successful request.

section.title: Example
